attributes.action: Shut Down Parliament if they hold a 2nd referendum to Leave or Remain in the EU
attributes.additional_details: On 23rd June 2016 there was a referendum as to whether the UK Left or Remained in the EU. The Leave campaign won and yet Parliament are using every tactic and power to stop the withdrawal from the EU
attributes.background: Because the UK voted to leave the EU in 2016. We are a democratic country and by holding a second referendum this does not constitute democracy. If we held a referendum against every vote that the public have cast then the country would be in a state of disaster
